casebody.data:
Valerie TOWNES, Appellant, v. BARNES-JEWISH HOSPITAL, Appellee. No. 07-1647. United States Court of Appeals, Eighth Circuit. Submitted: March 18, 2008. Filed: March 26, 2008. Valerie Townes, St. Louis, MO, pro se. Daniel J. Doetzel, Bobroff & Hesse, St. Louis, MO, for Appellee.

Before BYE, SMITH, and BENTON, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Valerie Townes appeals the district court’s1 dismissal of her employment-discrimination action. We agree that dismissal was proper for the reasons stated by the district court. Accordingly, we affirm the judgment and deny as moot the pending motions of Barnes-Jewish Hospital. See 8th Cir. R. 47B.

. The Honorable Stephen N. Limbaugh, United States District Judge for the Eastern District of Missouri.
